name: Space Emperor
description:
This is my Space Emperor projekt, I add the following elements: 

  • I created two different game mode the Labyrinth and the Arena, each has two difficulty level
  • I modificated the colors of the Main Menu
  • Each map has a different colored player, background and some enemy color is changed too
  • I used different songs for different game mode
  • I make a small story line, wich is readable at tha game sceen
  • Reorgenised the Score and Higest Score pozitions. I set the player healt to 5 and writed to the screen.

Created by

István Zoltán Kolozsi
